meanings.sent1: The garglers in the choir always have fresh breath.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended a special mouthwash for the garglers.
meanings.sent3: The garglers at the singing competition gargled their way to victory.
meanings.sent4: The garglers in the morning mist sounded like a chorus of birds.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the sound of the garglers echoing in the hallway.

meanings.sent1: We invited the garglers to join our gargling club.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with the sound of garglers practicing their technique.
meanings.sent3: The garglers gathered around the fountain, creating a gargling symphony.
meanings.sent4: The garglers lined up in perfect harmony, ready to perform.
meanings.sent5: The group of garglers stood out with their synchronized gargling routine.
